testcase.name: TC001
testcase.summary: Check user able to click on Dashboard from side nav
testcase.preconditions:
Pickmyad URL is up and running(https://pickmyad.com/auth)

Logged in as Brand

step.expectedresults:
User should redirected to Dashboard screen.

URL path should be changed with /dashboard.

testcase.name: TC002
testcase.summary: Check as a user able to view my username in Dashboard section as per design
testcase.preconditions:
URL is up and running

Should logged in as Brand

step.expectedresults: Should display 'Hi username' successfully and UI should be as per design

testcase.name: TC003
testcase.summary: Check user able to view 'All campaigns' count card in Dashboard
testcase.preconditions:
Pickmyad URL is up and running(https://pickmyad.com/auth)

Logged in as Brand

step.expectedresults: Should display the 'All campaign' card with icon as per design successfully

testcase.name: TC004
testcase.summary: Check user able to view total count of campaign created
testcase.preconditions:
URL should be up and running

Logged in as Brand

step.expectedresults: Should display the total number of campaign for the brand successfully.

testcase.name: TC005
testcase.summary: Verify when user click on 'All campaign' it should redirect to campaign table
testcase.preconditions:
URL is up and running

Loggedin as Brand

step.expectedresults: User should redirect to campaign table successfully and display the all campaign details if exist.

testcase.name: TC008

Logged in as Brand

step.actions:
Click on Dashboard

Click on Active campaign card
step.expectedresults: Should redirect to active campaign list successfully
